ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Light Sources
ygData.msgSnippet: If you see someone killing wisps ask to loot a burned out lightstone.  They provide light too, but are otherwise worthless ;) Quwi ...
ygData.messageBody:
If you see someone killing wisps ask to loot a burned
out lightstone. They provide light too, but are
otherwise worthless ;)

Quwi
--- Mac <bigmaca3@...> wrote:
> I went halfelf just because of that. But there are
> other light
> sources. Fire beetle eyes work well until you get a
> lightstone.
> Without a magic weapon wisps are out of your league.
>
>
> Once you a few GLS go to North Karana and give it to
> one of the
> gypses. She'll give you a book you can sell for
> about 10 plat, and
> you can sell it to her! I think her name is
> Myrisla?
>
> Tuldayen Grimblade
> Pathfinder of Tunare
> Terris-Thule, Summoners of the Realm
>
http://www.magelo.com/eq_view_profile.html?num=761750
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "SandyHexe"
> <FlaumigeHexe@g...>
> wrote:
> > If you go to East Commons and kill the Willowisps
> they drop a
> lightstone or
> > greater lightstone as well as a little coin. Don't
> put it in a
> backpack
> > leave it in one of your inventory slots and it
> will improve your
> vision. I
> > ve had one on my beastlord now since level 4 and
> it hasn't burned
> out yet.
> > Oh and the greater lightstones sell for about 6pp
> depending on your
> charisma
> >
> > Flaumigahexe
> > Quellious
> > -------Original Message-------
> >
> > From: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > Date: Sunday, December 07, 2003 9:03:43 AM
> > To: EverQuest \(E-mail\)
> > Subject: [EverQuest] Light Sources
> >
> > I have human paladin (level 6) and he suffers from
> the same problem
> the rest
> > of his race does. He uses a 2 handed sword so I
> can't carry
> anything in my
> > hands. I have the worn newbie candle in my pack
> for light. I
> bought a
> > lantern but it did nothing in my pack. I was
> looking in the bazaar
> and saw
> > lightstones, mechanical light emitters and various
> creature eyes.
> Are any
> > of these a better light then my candle and can
> they be used from my
> pack?
> > When I look at the items it makes no mention of
> range or brightness.
> >
> > Iksar monk 12
> > Wood Elf Ranger 12
> > Human Paladin 6
> > "just trying all the options to see what I like."
> >
>
>
